sub_title: Sales Account Executive | Project Manager | Business Developer
summary:
✉ tallitagualter@hotmail.com

Accomplished professional holding a BSc in Business Administration from Lisbo University, certified QHSE - Occupational Hygienist with over 15 years of rich experience in sales, account management, project management, chemical cleaning, and monitoring coordination in the Oil & Gas industry across Brazil and the Netherlands. Served as the Project Manager for customized valve production for FPSO, driving end-to-end project execution.

Currently working for a Dutch company, providing the full sales and project cycle of FPSO/onshore/offshore valves. Developed and implemented comprehensive project plans and ensured adherence to timeline, budget, and quality requirements. Developed and managed strong relationships with both new and existing clients, fostering trust and loyalty.

Main Achievements
-Established and registered the company with leading FPSO operators, significantly expanding the professional network.
-Successfully doubled annual profit within three months through strategic planning and execution.
-Sustained and nurtured key client relationships, contributing to 90% of the company's total revenue.
-Led successful expansion into the Brazilian market, significantly driving company growth and diversification.
-Ensured timely and profitable delivery of projects, showcasing effective project management skills.
-Maintained positive client and supplier relationships, fostering a beneficial working environment.
-Secured increased acquisitions of new projects, significantly contributing to the company's growth and success.
-Consistently achieved high client satisfaction levels, strengthening client relationships and promoting customer loyalty.

I’m always interested in hearing from former colleagues, managers, or just interesting professionals, so feel free to contact me if you’d like to connect.

profile_positions.description:
-Developed and managed strong relationships with both new and existing clients, fostering trust and loyalty.
-Acted as the principal point of contact for clients at all levels, providing support both before and after sales, and successfully resolved unexpected issues upfront to prevent project disruption.
-Monitored project progress, expedited tasks as needed, and ensured schedule compliance to meet client expectations and management directives.
-Operated within the agreed-upon budget and scope, demonstrating team-oriented work ethic to achieve project objectives.
-Managed and coordinated the company's registrations on clients' vendor lists by reviewing technical and quality requirements.
-Provided support to various company departments (technical, quality, financial, etc.) during the pre-qualification stage, assisting in document preparation and site assessment.
-Served as the principal contact with clients for finding resolutions, facilitating clear communication and problem-solving.
profile_positions.title: Sales Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
-Served as the Project Manager for customized valve production for SPFO (Submarine Pipeline Flowline and Offshore), driving end-to-end project execution.
-Developed and implemented comprehensive project plans, ensuring adherence to timeline, budget, and quality requirements.
-Coordinated with cross-functional teams, including design, manufacturing, and quality control, to ensure seamless production processes.
-Reviewed technical specifications and requirements for customized valves, ensuring alignment with client expectations and industry standards.
-Managed risks and issues proactively, implementing contingency plans to minimize project disruptions.
-Conducted regular project reviews and status meetings, keeping all stakeholders informed of project progress and potential issues.
-Delivered project completion reports, documenting key outcomes, lessons learned, and suggestions for future projects.
-Fostered strong relationships with suppliers and vendors, ensuring timely delivery of materials and components.
-Collaborated closely with clients, providing regular updates and addressing any concerns or issues promptly to ensure client satisfaction.
-Ensured adherence to safety and compliance standards in all project activities, promoting a safe and healthy work environment.

profile_positions.description:
-Generated new business opportunities, driving growth and expansion both nationally and internationally.
-Created and presented compelling sales proposals to prospective clients, effectively communicating the value proposition.
-Developed and maintained strong relationships with clients, successfully meeting their needs and exceeding expectations.
-Focused on promoting MRO products for onshore and offshore industries, including pipes, flanges, fittings, couplings, spare parts, valves, and other related products.
-Participated in project planning and execution, leveraging expertise to ensure the success of various initiatives.
-Organized and attended exhibitions to promote our product line, cultivating new business opportunities and expanding our client base.
-Registered the company in new Approved Vendor Lists (AVLs), contributing to the expansion of market reach.
-Oversaw delivery schedules, ensuring products were delivered on time and within specifications, leading to enhanced customer satisfaction.
-Maintained regular communication with clients throughout the sales and delivery process, ensuring they were well-informed and satisfied with the service.
profile_positions.title: International Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
-Client: Braskem UNIB – Bahia / Brazil
-Served as a Technical Service Representative specializing in Crude Water Analysis for the oil, gas, and petrochemical processes.
-Performed in-depth pH analysis, analysis of suspended solids, and total solids analysis to ensure process integrity and compliance.
-Prepared solutions and standard solutions to facilitate precise and accurate analyses.
-Collaborated closely with Braskem UNIB in Bahia, Brazil, providing them with comprehensive and timely technical support.
-Leveraged technical expertise to recommend and implement improvements to the crude water analysis process.
-Consistently maintained high standards of safety and quality control in all analysis procedures.
-Worked closely with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with overall company objectives and standards.
-Developed and maintained strong customer relationships, addressing issues promptly and ensuring customer satisfaction.
-Conducted regular reviews and reports on work performed, maintaining transparency and enabling process improvements.
profile_positions.title: Technical Service Representative

profile_positions.description:
-Oversaw and coordinated wastewater analysis and management operations activities, ensuring efficient and compliant practices.
-Developed and implemented comprehensive plans for the testing and analysis of wastewater samples.
-Ensured compliance with local and national environmental standards and regulations.
-Reviewed and interpreted testing results to identify anomalies, trends, and potential environmental impacts, ensuring proactive measures.
-Collaborated with various teams to implement solutions based on analysis results, improving operational efficiency.
-Maintained detailed records of testing procedures, results, and actions taken, promoting transparency and accuracy in reporting.
-Delivered regular reports on wastewater analysis results and the effectiveness of implemented solutions, providing key insights to stakeholders.
-Devised strategies to enhance wastewater management systems and processes, leading to optimized performance.
-Worked closely with our principal client, Petrobras, meeting their specific needs and exceeding expectations.
profile_positions.title: Chemical Analyst Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
-Coordinated chemical cleaning operations, ensuring adherence to industry standards and best practices.
-Developed comprehensive plans and procedures to guide the team and maintain efficiency in chemical cleaning processes.
-Authored detailed administrative reports to provide key insights into operational performance and highlight areas for improvement.
-Led a high-performing team, fostering a collaborative environment and promoting professional growth.
- Principal Client: Petrobras
profile_positions.title: Chemical Cleaning Process Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
-Conducted environmental monitoring and inspections to maintain regulatory standards in petrochemical and refinery settings.
-Undertook collection and monitoring of aerosols for quality assurance and environmental compliance.
-Performed hydrocarbon analysis in collaboration with experts from Shell Solutions Netherlands at Braskem's Units (UNIB).
-Prepared and issued detailed appraisal reports and occupational hygiene program reports (QHES), ensuring adherence to international norms and guidelines.
-Provided necessary training and performed inspections to promote occupational health and safety practices across teams.
-Led the development and implementation of risk maps in the refineries and petrochemical sectors, enhancing site-wide understanding of potential hazards.
-Successfully implemented the Occupational Health, Environmental, and Safety Program, adhering to the Six Sigma, NHO, and OSHA (Occupational Health and Safety Assessment Services) standards.

Clients:
-Braskem (PVC and Clorosoda Unit), Alagoas
